sgcool_label_text:The Gay World Amusement Park was a leisure destination for families
 and was the venue for various sporting events and circuses. For the first few years after Singapore’s independence
 a National Day Exposition would be held there every year. It was organised by the Singapore Geylang West Citizens’ Consultative Committee. The Gay World Amusement Park was a leisure destination for families
 and was the venue for various sporting events and circuses. For the first few years after Singapore’s independence
 a National Day Exposition would be held there every year. It was organised by the Singapore Geylang West Citizens’ Consultative Committee.

metadata.sgcool_label_text: The Gay World Amusement Park was a leisure destination for families, and was the venue for various sporting events and circuses. For the first few years after Singapore’s independence, a National Day Exposition would be held there every year. It was organised by the Singapore Geylang West Citizens’ Consultative Committee. The Gay World Amusement Park was a leisure destination for families, and was the venue for various sporting events and circuses. For the first few years after Singapore’s independence, a National Day Exposition would be held there every year. It was organised by the Singapore Geylang West Citizens’ Consultative Committee.
